page.title: 01TRANSPORT
page.content: Running through our area we have major Roads,Canals and Railways. {Canals} The Northamton Arm of the Grand Union Canal runs from The Blisworth Arm to Rothersthorpe Crossing passing through 17 Locks. {Roads} The Main Road in the area is the M1 Motorway,and in the N.W. corner is the Rothersthorpe service area where travellers can have their breakfast and they can fill their cars up with petrol. {Railways} There is only one railway running in our area. Another railway used to run to Market Harborough.The one that runs through our area runs from Wolverton to Rugby and to Bedford.
